messages.start:
Hi {}, Welcome to Developers Job Hub Bot! 🤖

I provide personalised developer job listings based on your programming stack straight to your DM with ease after scraping and exploring the web 😊🚀

All jobs are gotten from
• weworkremotely.com
• remoteok.io
• employremotely.com
• remotive.io
• stackoverflow.com
• jobs.github.com

Made with ❤️ in 🇳🇬
messages.menu:
What do you wanna do today 🤗

/view_stack 👀
/add_stack 😏
/remove_stack 😱
/donate 💰
/stats ⚙️
messages.empty_stack: You have not told us your stack, get started with /add_stack 😏
messages.add_stack:
Enter the stacks you want to include to your profile separated by comma (,)

If you want to receive job postings for all stacks enter 'all' without quotes e.g python, react, css, rust
messages.updated_stack: Your programming stack has been successfully updated 🙂
messages.unknown: I don't understand your message ⁉️, please check /menu for valid commands
messages.donate:
Developers Job Hub is free to use meaning you don't ever pay to use the service. However, do we accept donations to keep our servers and scrapers working. Feel free to donate to the service with cryptocurrency
